verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Name Of Jesus! Highest Name! Name That Earth And Heaven Adore! From The Heart Of God It Came, Leads Me To Godâ€™s Heart Once More.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Name Of Jesus! Living Tide! Days Of Drought For Me Are Past; How Much More Than Satisfied Are The Thirsty Lips At Last!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Name Of Jesus! Dearest Name! Bread Of Heaven, And Balm Of Love: Oil Of Gladness, Surest Claim To The Treasures Stored Above.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus Gives Forgiveness Free, Jesus Cleanses All My Stains; Jesus Gives His Life To Me, Jesus Always He Remains.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Only Jesus! Fairest Name! Life, And Rest, And Peace, And Bliss; Jesus, Evermore The Same, He Is Mine, And I Am His.
